title: Discover the BEST of Rural Life in Manikganj Char

tasks.task: Fight through rapids while operating a riverside farming equipment.
subtasks: Drive the riverside farming equipment through the rapids.
Monitor equipment performance during challenging river conditions.
Adjust equipment speed or direction to navigate through the rapids.
Ensure personal safety while operating the equipment in the rapids.
Inspect river levees or embankments for erosion or damage.
Repair or reinforce riverbank structures if necessary.
Clear any debris from river channels to prevent equipment obstruction.

tasks.task: Operate a mobile agricultural irrigation system near a river.
subtasks: Position the irrigation system near the riverbank.
Operate valves or pumps to direct water towards crops.
Monitor water flow and adjust as needed.
Watch for potential bends or currents that might compromise the irrigation system.
